text.en_US: A Heat-attuned golem patrolling the mysterious ruins of \c[3]\v[area.autumn-dng.name]\c[0]. Normally resistant to all attacks, this golem will charge up a powerful, burning cyclone if provoked enough, which can conveniently be interrupted by launching a Heat gust bullet into it. This golem specializes in spreading lingering fire around and will occasionally use the volcano on top of its body to launch fiery rocks from above.
